Dialogues.Text: Why, hello there! I don't think you're helping me out today. Is there something I can do for ya?

Responses.Title: I'd like to ask you something.

Dialogues.Text: Well you came to the right place! What can I get for ya?
Well that's just perfect! I happen to have some leftovers; here you go. Enjoy!
I'm not in the mood for chit chat. >:(
